title: new Beta client,  it fail to retrieve update to 6.23 and i am stuck
body:
Hi guys , 
please help me,
i use the new beta client,
last worked at 6.22,
when i start it, it try to update to 6.23
and freeze from the 0%
when i go to legacy version,
same problem , it try to update and freeze at counting files #1.
Help!

replies.body: It sounds like your patcher is trying to scan your game files to prepare an update, but is being blocked.  Check out our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your game files can be accessed for both versions of the client.  That should do the trick!
